structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.history: Repealed 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 93, sec. 12. -- Amended 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 152, sec. 49. -- Amended 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 184, sec. 13. -- Created 1956 Ky. Acts ch. 207, sec. 13.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Private vehicles to stop on approach of fire apparatus and participating vehicles -- Penalty for violation.
